function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased reliance on teleworking may lead to reduced face-to-face interactions, impacting social connections and mental well-being.","Impact":"Isolation, decreased mental health, strained relationships.","Mitigation":"Encourage virtual social interactions, provide mental health support, promote work-life balance.","Technologies":"Virtual meeting platforms, mental health apps, productivity tools.","People":"Remote workers, employees, employers, individuals in teleworking roles.","Owner":"Employers, mental health professionals, HR departments."},{"Description":"Exclusion of certain career groups from teleworking may create disparities and inequalities in access to remote work opportunities.","Impact":"Limited career advancement, unequal access to remote work benefits.","Mitigation":"Provide training and resources for underrepresented career groups, promote diversity and inclusion in teleworking policies.","Technologies":"Online training platforms, diversity and inclusion software, remote collaboration tools.","People":"Underrepresented career groups, employees in non-teleworkable roles.","Owner":"HR departments, diversity and inclusion committees, management."},{"Description":"Reliance on telemedicine and remote healthcare services may lead to potential gaps in patient care and medical oversight.","Impact":"Delayed diagnosis, reduced quality of care, privacy and security concerns.","Mitigation":"Invest in telemedicine infrastructure, ensure data security and patient privacy, provide training for healthcare professionals.","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, cybersecurity software, training simulations.","People":"Patients, healthcare professionals, medical staff.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, IT departments, medical institutions."}]}
